set(SDL2_IMAGE_INCLUDE_DIRS ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include
	CACHE INTERNAL "SDL2_image Include Dir")

set(SDL2_IMAGE_LIBRARIES
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/x86/SDL2_image.lib
	CACHE INTERNAL "SDL2_image Libs")
	
FILE(GLOB SDL2_IMAGE_DLLS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/x86/*.dll")
INSTALL(FILES ${SDL2_IMAGE_DLLS}
  DESTINATION bin)
